price: Nkuro a Yɛdii wͻn anim kan sεee wͻn no mu biara nnihͻ a wͻgye diiε. Enti wͻn bεgye adi anaa?
arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā āmanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknāhā afahum yu'minūna
